<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Career_in_Law_Enforcement">Career in Law Enforcement</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: Career in Law Enforcement">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Inspector_General_of_Nepal_Police">Inspector General of Nepal Police</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Inspector General of Nepal Police">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Khadgajeet Baral was promoted to "<a href="/wiki/Inspector_General_of_Nepal_Police" class="mw-redirect" title="Inspector General of Nepal Police">Inspector General of Police (I.G.P.)</a>" at the age of 43, becoming one of the youngest <a href="/wiki/Inspector_General_of_Nepal_Police" class="mw-redirect" title="Inspector General of Nepal Police">police chiefs</a> in the <a href="/wiki/History_of_Nepal" title="History of Nepal">history of Nepal</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-8">&#91;8&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-9">&#91;9&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-10">&#91;10&#93;</a></sup> He had been the <i>"first <a href="/wiki/Post_graduate" class="mw-redirect" title="Post graduate">post graduate</a> police officer"</i> to be recommended by the then 'National <a href="/wiki/Civil_service_commission" title="Civil service commission">Public Service Commission</a>'<sup id="cite_ref-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-11">&#91;11&#93;</a></sup> to <a href="/wiki/His_Majesty%27s_Government" class="mw-redirect" title="His Majesty&#39;s Government">His Majesty's Government</a> as the Inspector-General of Police<sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-12">&#91;12&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>IGP Baral and his predecessor, IGP <a href="/wiki/Rom_Bahadur_Thapa" title="Rom Bahadur Thapa">Rom Bahadur Thapa</a>, are the only pair to remain chiefs for a period of six years, the standard tenure being four years.<sup id="cite_ref-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-13">&#91;13&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-14">&#91;14&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>During his tenure as police chief,<sup id="cite_ref-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-15">&#91;15&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-16">&#91;16&#93;</a></sup> Baral is famed for his major contributions in the administrative sectors of the <a href="/wiki/Nepal_Police" title="Nepal Police">Nepal Police organization</a>. The establishments of the <i>Kanun Sakha</i> and <i>Engineering Sakha</i> in the Nepal Police Headquarters are a few of his accomplishments. He established the Nepal Police Mountaineering &amp; Adventure Foundation, which, in Nepal is very historical; it conquered many Himalayan peaks, exclusively by Nepalese mountaineers; the Tukuche Himal (6921m) and Pabil Himal (7104m) conquered in 1976 A.D. and 1978 A.D. respectively are prime examples.<sup id="cite_ref-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-17">&#91;17&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18">&#91;18&#93;</a></sup> The construction of the "<a href="/wiki/Birendra_Police_Hospital" class="mw-redirect" title="Birendra Police Hospital">Birendra Police Hospital</a>" (present Nepal Police Hospital) had also commenced in his tenure.<sup id="cite_ref-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-19">&#91;19&#93;</a></sup>
I.G.P. Baral's remarkable establishment of the <a href="/wiki/Nepal_Police_Flying_Squad" title="Nepal Police Flying Squad">Nepal Police Flying Squad</a> in 1975, which consisted of four imported state-of-the-art vehicles from <a href="/wiki/China" title="China">China</a> and about a dozen elite Nepalese officers, for crime prevention, is considered admirable even now.<sup id="cite_ref-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-20">&#91;20&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-21">&#91;21&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>I.G.P. Baral is a major reformist in Nepal Police.<sup id="cite_ref-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-22">&#91;22&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-23">&#91;23&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-24">&#91;24&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-25">&#91;25&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-26">&#91;26&#93;</a></sup>
<sup id="cite_ref-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-27">&#91;27&#93;</a></sup> He had made <a href="/wiki/Garrison_ration" title="Garrison ration">rations</a> available to all of the low-ranking police <a href="/wiki/Personnel" class="mw-redirect" title="Personnel">personnel</a> and made the provision of <a href="/wiki/Barracks" title="Barracks">barracks</a> possible. In order to manage the busy traffic in the <a href="/wiki/Kathmandu_valley" class="mw-redirect" title="Kathmandu valley">Kathmandu valley</a>, he introduced '<a href="/wiki/Mounted_Police" class="mw-redirect" title="Mounted Police">Mounted Police</a>', i.e. <a href="/wiki/Traffic_guard" title="Traffic guard">traffic police</a> officers on horses.<sup id="cite_ref-28" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-28">&#91;28&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Ambassador_to_Burma">Ambassador to Burma</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Ambassador to Burma">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>During the reign of the then <a href="/wiki/King_Birendra" class="mw-redirect" title="King Birendra">King Birendra</a>, Khadgajeet Baral had been appointed the <i><a href="/wiki/Royal_family" title="Royal family">Royal</a> <a href="/wiki/Ambassador" title="Ambassador">Ambassador</a> of Nepal to <a href="/wiki/Burma_(Myanmar)" class="mw-redirect" title="Burma (Myanmar)">Burma (Myanmar)</a></i> for a six-year tenure.<sup id="cite_ref-29" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-29">&#91;29&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Ambassador_to_French_Indochina_and_Indonesia">Ambassador to French Indochina and Indonesia</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: Ambassador to French Indochina and Indonesia">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Khadgajeet Baral had also been accredited the <a href="/wiki/Royal_family" title="Royal family">Royal</a> <a href="/wiki/Ambassador" title="Ambassador">Ambassador</a> of <a href="/wiki/Nepal" title="Nepal">Nepal</a> to <a href="/wiki/Cambodia" title="Cambodia">Cambodia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Laos" title="Laos">Laos</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vietnam" title="Vietnam">Vietnam</a> during the same time when he had been the ambassador to <a href="/wiki/Myanmar" title="Myanmar">Myanmar</a>.
</p><p>During Ambassador Baral's six-year tenure as an <a href="/wiki/Accredited" class="mw-redirect" title="Accredited">accredited</a> ambassador to French Indo-China and Indonesia, there had arisen some political tension between the neighboring countries <a href="/wiki/Indonesia" title="Indonesia">Indonesia</a> and <a href="/wiki/Malaysia" title="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>. K.J.S. Baral had used this an opportunity to make use of his diplomatic skills to establish <a href="/wiki/Diplomatic_relations" class="mw-redirect" title="Diplomatic relations">diplomatic relations</a> between Nepal and Indonesia.<sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-30">&#91;30&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Contribution_to_sports">Contribution to sports</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5" title="Edit section: Contribution to sports">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:202px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Former_Vice-President_of_Nepal_Badminton_Association,_Khadgajeet_Baral,_after_being_felicitated_by_NBA_for_his_contributions_to_development_of_Badminton_in_Nepal_during_his_tenure.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a7/Former_Vice-President_of_Nepal_Badminton_Association%2C_Khadgajeet_Baral%2C_after_being_felicitated_by_NBA_for_his_contributions_to_development_of_Badminton_in_Nepal_during_his_tenure.jpg/200px-thumbnail.jpg" decoding="async" width="200" height="356" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a7/Former_Vice-President_of_Nepal_Badminton_Association%2C_Khadgajeet_Baral%2C_after_being_felicitated_by_NBA_for_his_contributions_to_development_of_Badminton_in_Nepal_during_his_tenure.jpg/300px-thumbnail.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a7/Former_Vice-President_of_Nepal_Badminton_Association%2C_Khadgajeet_Baral%2C_after_being_felicitated_by_NBA_for_his_contributions_to_development_of_Badminton_in_Nepal_during_his_tenure.jpg/400px-thumbnail.jpg 2x" data-file-width="2248" data-file-height="4000" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Former_Vice-President_of_Nepal_Badminton_Association,_Khadgajeet_Baral,_after_being_felicitated_by_NBA_for_his_contributions_to_development_of_Badminton_in_Nepal_during_his_tenure.jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Former Vice-President of Nepal Badminton Association (NBA), KJS Baral, after being felicitated with the <i>"Nepal Badminton Samman 2069"</i> on the auspicious occasion of the <i>36th National Badminton Competition 2069</i> by NBA in 2013 for his contributions to development of Badminton in Nepal during his tenure as Vice-President.</div></div></div>
<p>Baral had also served as the Vice President of the Nepal Badminton Association after his retirement from <a href="/wiki/Law_enforcement" title="Law enforcement">law enforcement</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-31" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-31">&#91;31&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-32" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-32">&#91;32&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Nepal_Judo_Association">Nepal Judo Association</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6" title="Edit section: Nepal Judo Association">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Baral had served as the President of the Nepal Judo Association for six years during the 1990s. During his tenure as president, many reforms were introduced in Nepalese Judo. During the second 'Rajiv Gandhi International Judo Championship' of 1995, the then President Baral had led a Judo team from Nepal to compete during the championship.<sup id="cite_ref-33" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-33">&#91;33&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-34" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-34">&#91;34&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Nepal_Hockey_Association">Nepal Hockey Association</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7" title="Edit section: Nepal Hockey Association">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Baral also founded the Nepal Hockey Association, remaining president for a period of 8 years. He promoted the standard of <a href="/wiki/Field_hockey" title="Field hockey">Hockey in Nepal</a> by bringing in two Hockey players from <a href="/wiki/Pakistan" title="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>. He alone is responsible for introducing hockey and making <a href="/wiki/Field_hockey" title="Field hockey">it</a> famous in Nepal, and as such, is regarded as the <i><a href="/wiki/Innovator" class="mw-redirect" title="Innovator">Pioneer</a> of Nepalese Hockey</i>.<sup id="cite_ref-35" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-35">&#91;35&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Retired_Life">Retired Life</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8" title="Edit section: Retired Life">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><i>Rtd. Hon.</i> Khadgajeet Baral is now an active member of "The <a href="/wiki/Rotary_Club" class="mw-redirect" title="Rotary Club">Rotary Club</a> Of Pashupati" <sup id="cite_ref-36" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-36">&#91;36&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-37" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-37">&#91;37&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-38" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-38">&#91;38&#93;</a></sup> and an active golfer at the <a href="/wiki/Royal_Nepal_Golf_Club" title="Royal Nepal Golf Club">Royal Nepal Golf Club</a> (RNGC).<sup id="cite_ref-39" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-39">&#91;39&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-40" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-40">&#91;40&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-41" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-41">&#91;41&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-42" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-42">&#91;42&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Khadgajeet_Baral&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

<li id="cite_note-11"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-11">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://theuniversaltimes.com/view/3/news-285.html">"सुरक्षा अंगमा नियुक्तिको लागि सार्कस्तरीय ढाँचा अवलम्बन गर्न आवश्यक...यद्यपि, २०१४ मा प्रहरी निरीक्षक पदमा नियुक्त पूर्वआईजीपी÷राजदूत खड्गजीत बराल, अख्तियार दुरूपयोग अनुसन्धान आयोगको पूर्वप्रमुख आयुक्त÷डीआईजीपी रामप्रसाद श्रेष्ठ र पूर्वअञ्चलाधीश शैलेन्द्रप्रसाद सिन्हा सर्वप्रथम लोकसेवा आयोगबाटै छनौट भएका थिए । प्रहरी अधिकृतको छनौटमा आयोगको संलग्नता पछिसम्म देखिएता पनि यो नाममात्रको भयो ।"</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%BF+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%AF+%E0%A4%A2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%81%E0%A4%9A%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%95...%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%BF%2C+%E0%A5%A8%E0%A5%A6%E0%A5%A7%E0%A5%AA+%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%95+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%88%E0%A4%9C%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%80%C3%B7%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%9C%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%96%E0%A4%A1%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%9C%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B2%2C+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%96%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B%E0%A4%97+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A7%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%96+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%C3%B7%E0%A4%A1%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%88%E0%A4%9C%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A6+%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B7%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A0+%E0%A4%B0+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%9E <li id="cite_note-15"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-15">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.spotlightnepal.com/News/Article/NEPAL-POLICE-Unstable-As-Ever">"<span class="cs1-kern-left">"</span>Nepal Police has a very important role to provide a secure environment to the people. Whatever the situation it faces, Nepal Police will need to guarantee the people's right to live in peace," said Khadga Jit Baral, former chief of Nepal Police"</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%22Nepal+Police+has+a+very+important+role+to+provide+a+secure+environment+to+the+people.+Whatever+the+situation+it+faces%2C+Nepal+Police+will+need+to+guarantee+the+people%27s+right+to+live+in+peace%2C%22+said+Khadga+Jit+Baral%2C+former+chief+of+Nepal+Police&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.spotlightnepal.com%2FNews%2FArticle%2FNEPAL-POLICE-Unstable-As-Ever&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-16"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-16">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://thtimes.pugmarks.in/fullTodays.php?headline=Former+Police+Staff+Council+panel+&amp;NewsID=374597">"Central Chairman of the Council Chinta Bahadur Basnet, honoured former inspector generals duo Dhruba Bahadur Pradhan and Khadgajit Baral"</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Central+Chairman+of+the+Council+Chinta+Bahadur+Basnet%2C+honoured+former+inspector+generals+duo+Dhruba+Bahadur+Pradhan+and+Khadgajit+Baral.&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fthtimes.pugmarks.in%2FfullTodays.php%3Fheadline%3DFormer%2BPolice%2BStaff%2BCouncil%2Bpanel%2B%26NewsID%3D374597&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-17"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-17">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFKhatri2006" class="citation book cs1">Khatri, Deepak (2006). <i>Inspector Capsule</i>. p.&#160;346.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Inspector+Capsule&amp;rft.pages=346&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft.aulast=Khatri&amp;rft.aufirst=Deepak&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>

<li id="cite_note-18"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-18">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150217074528/http://www.fridayweekly.com.np/people.php?id=1858">"Shiro Kurauchi: I first came to Nepal in October 1977 after the Nepal Police invited me to organize a mountaineering course for police officials. The then IGP, Baral, wanted to establish a mountaineering academy in Lamjung. The idea was to organize expeditions with just Nepali members. The IGP asked one of his friends to look for someone who could come to Nepal and organize such as course...When I used to go on drives with IGP Baral along the Ring Road, I would only see bicycles"</a>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.fridayweekly.com.np/people.php?id=1858">the original</a> on 2015-02-17<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2015-02-17</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Shiro+Kurauchi%3A+I+first+came+to+Nepal+in+October+1977+after+the+Nepal+Police+invited+me+to+organize+a+mountaineering+course+for+police+officials.+The+then+IGP%2C+Baral%2C+wanted+to+establish+a+mountaineering+academy+in+Lamjung.+The+idea+was+to+organize+expeditions+with+just+Nepali+members.+The+IGP+asked+one+of+his+friends+to+look+for+someone+who+could+come+to+Nepal+and+organize+such+as+course...When+I+used+to+go+on+drives+with+IGP+Baral+along+the+Ring+Road%2C+I+would+only+see+bicycles.&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fridayweekly.com.np%2Fpeople.php%3Fid%3D1858&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>

<li id="cite_note-25"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-25">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150211162541/http://np.karobardaily.com/2014/10/35307/">"सत्ता र स्वार्थको घेरामा प्रहरी... खड्गजीत बरालका विचारमा विगतका कमीकमजोरी सुधार्दै आगामी चुनौतीको सामना गर्नुको विकल्प छैन । प्रहरी दिवसको सन्दर्भ पारेर पूर्वआईजीपी बराल भन्छन्, "कमीकमजोरी सबैबाट हुन्छन्, त्यसलाई सुधार्दै संगठनको प्रभावकारिता र आम जनताप्रति विश्वसनियता जगाउँदै अघि बढ्नु अहिलेको आवश्यकता हो ।"...Karobar Daily"</a>. <li id="cite_note-26"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-26">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150211163652/http://np.karobardaily.com/2014/03/28247/">"रहेनन् विवादित पूर्वआईजीपी लामा... खड्गजीत बराल नेपाल प्रहरीको इतिहासमा सबैभन्दा कुशल र सक्षम आईजीपीको रूपमा लामालाई लिन्छन् । बहालवाला तथा अवकाशप्राप्त प्रहरी अधिकारीहरू ६३ वर्ष लामो प्रहरीको इतिहासमा बरालपछि संगठनलाई सफल र सक्षम नेतृत्व प्रदान गर्नेमा उनै लामालाई लिइन्छ । ...Karobar Daily"</a>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://np.karobardaily.com/2014/03/28247/">the original</a> on 2015-02-11.</cite><span <li id="cite_note-27"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-27">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFShrestha2015" class="citation news cs1">Shrestha, Shibaji (2015-07-09). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150725032717/http://www.nepalipatra.com/news/detail/15626/5">"प्रहरीको सलाम र गृहमन्त्री...नेपाल प्रहरीमा यस्ता ब्यक्ति पनि आइजिपी भए-खडगजित बराल जो तत्कालीन गृहमन्त्रीको सनकपनलाई लिएर 'ए गृहबहादुर' भनेर सम्बोधन गर्ने हिम्मत गर्थे । (4th paragraph, 4th-5th line)"</a> &#91;Police's Salute &amp; the Home Minister&#93;. <i>Nepali Patra</i> (in Nepali). <li id="cite_note-31"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-31">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150217073708/http://nsc.gov.np/news/show/886">"विकाशलाई पराजित गर्दै रत्नजित राष्ट्रिय च्याम्पियन...सम्मानित हुने ब्यक्तित्वहरुमा नेपाल ब्याडमिन्टन संघका पूर्व अध्यक्ष शुसिल शमसेर जवरा जो संघको मानार्थ आजीवन अध्यक्ष हुनु हुन्छ । उहााको बागदरवारस्थित घरको कोठाबाट सुरु भएको खेल संस्था आज राष्ट्रिय खेलकुद परिषदको नाममा परिचित छ । त्यस्तै पूर्व उपाध्यक्ष प्रभु शमसेर जवरा, पूर्व अध्यक्ष विरेन्द्र बहादुर शाह, पूर्व उपाध्यक्ष खड्गजीत बराल (उहाा पूर्व प्रहरी महानिरीक्षक पनि हुनु हुन्छ), यस्तै अन्तराष्ट्रिय खेलाडी अक्रुर नरसिंह राणा, मोहनबहादुर शाही, त्रिरत्न मानन्धर, डा. सिंह बहादुर बस्नेत र दिलेन्द्र विर पाण्डे रहेका छन् ।"</a>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.thehimalayantimes.com/fullNews.php?headline=Bijayananda+lifts+Myanmar+envoy+cup&amp;NewsID=305770">the original</a> on 2014-03-15.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Himalayan+Times&amp;rft.atitle=Bijayananda+lifts+Myanmar+envoy+cup&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thehimalayantimes.com%2FfullNews.php%3Fheadline%3DBijayananda%2Blifts%2BMyanmar%2Benvoy%2Bcup%26NewsID%3D305770&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-42"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-42">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150217074718/http://topnepalnews.com/local-news/19489">"<span class="cs1-kern-left">'</span>कसौटिमा नेपाल प्रहरी'....उक्त अवसरमा उहाँले प्रहरी संगठनको सेवाको ऐतिहासिक अवस्थाको बारेमा चर्चा गर्नुहुदै नेपाल प्रहरी संगठन यस्तो संस्था हो जसले प्रजातन्त्रको लागि ठूलो महत्व राखेको छ । प्रहरी संगठनले दिइने सेवामा समयानुकुल आफुलाइ परिमाजिर्त गर्दै लगेको बताउनुहुदै उहाँले राष्ट्रको सुरक्षाको लागि देशको कुना काप्चामा पुग्ने प्रहरी कर्मचारीहरुले गरेको कार्यका बारेमा राम्रो र नराम्रो क्रियाकलाप हुनु स्वभाविक रहेको बताउनुभयो । प्रहरी संगठनको बृत्ति विकास प्रहरी आपैmले गर्न सक्छ भन्नुुहदै उहाँले प्रहरीको व्यवसायीकता सभ्यताको प्रतिक रहेकोले प्रहरीले नागरिकलाई दिइने सेवामा पारदर्शी, स्वच्छता र उत्कृष्ठ हुनुपर्ने बताउनुभयो । देशमा शान्ति सुरक्षा कायम गरी गतिशिलता प्रदान गर्न नेपाल प्रहरीलाई यस पुस्तकबाट आसातित सहयोग पुग्ने समेत उहाँले बताउनुभयो ।"</a>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://topnepalnews.com/local-news/19489">the original</a> on 2015-02-17<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2015-02-17</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%27%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8C%E0%A4%9F%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B2+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%27....%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A0%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%90%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95+%E0%A4%85%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A5%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%9A%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9A%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%88+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B2+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A0%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A5%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%9C%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%9C%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%BF+%E0%A4%A0%E0%A5%82%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%96%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%9B+%E0%A5%A4+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A0%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%87%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B2+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%AB%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%9C%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%88+%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%97%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%88+%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B7%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9F%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%BF+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B6%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9A%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%97%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%9A%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B0+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AA+%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%AD%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%AD%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A5%A4+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%82%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A0%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A5%83%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF+%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B8+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%88m%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9B+%E0%A4%AD%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%88+%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%B5%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%AD%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95+%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8B%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%88+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%87%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%80%2C+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%9A%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9B%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B0+%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%A4%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%83%E0%A4%B7%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A0+%E0%A4%B9%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%AD%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A5%A4+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B6%E0%A4%AE%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%B6%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%AE+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B6%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%97%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8+%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%AA%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%B2+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B0%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%80%E0%A4%B2%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%88+%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%B8+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%9F+%E0%A4%86%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B%E0%A4%97+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%97%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A4%AE%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%B9%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%81%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%A4%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%89%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%81%E0%A4%AD%E0%A4%AF%E0%A5%8B+%E0%A5%A4&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Ftopnepalnews.com%2Flocal-news%2F19489&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKhadgajeet+Baral" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
</ol></div>

    </div>

<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg/220px-Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="164" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg/330px-Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg/440px-Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="896" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Luise_Rainer_and_Paul_Baylay.jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Luise Rainer &amp; Paul Baylay at the Ritz Carlton Hotel in Berlin, 2011</div></div></div> <p><b>Paul DH Baylay</b> is an <a href="/wiki/Talent_manager" title="Talent manager">artist manager</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Music_publisher_(popular_music)" class="mw-redirect" title="Music publisher (popular music)">music publisher</a> notable for his work reuniting UK boyband <a href="/wiki/Blue_(English_band)" class="mw-redirect" title="Blue (English band)">Blue</a>. In 2010, Baylay led a prominent campaign<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup> to have Jewish two time <a href="/wiki/Academy_Awards" title="Academy Awards">Academy Award</a> winner, <a href="/wiki/Luise_Rainer" title="Luise Rainer">Luise Rainer</a>, honoured in her native country of <a href="/wiki/Germany" title="Germany">Germany</a>. Rainer was the world's first actor to win back to back Oscars in <a href="/wiki/Academy_Award_for_Best_Actress" title="Academy Award for Best Actress">1936</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Academy_Award_for_Best_Actress" title="Academy Award for Best Actress">1937</a>. Rainer had been forgotten when the Boulevard der Stars opened in 2010<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup> in Potsdamerplatz, <a href="/wiki/Berlin" title="Berlin">Berlin</a>, despite being Germany's only Academy Award-winning actor. In 2011, Rainer was nominated for a star but was then rejected by the jury<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3">&#91;3&#93;</a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/Senta_Berger" title="Senta Berger">Senta Berger</a>, <a href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gero_Gandert" class="extiw" title="de:Gero Gandert">Gero Gandert</a>, Uwe Kammann, <a href="/wiki/Dieter_Kosslick" title="Dieter Kosslick">Dieter Kosslick</a> and Hans Helmut Prinzler). Baylay campaigned across Germany,<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4">&#91;4&#93;</a></sup> lobbying press<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5">&#91;5&#93;</a></sup> and politicians to support the campaign to have the actress and her work recognised. The campaign was supported by the German <a href="/wiki/Central_Council_of_Jews_in_Germany" title="Central Council of Jews in Germany">Central Council of Jews</a>. In August 2011, the Boulevard der Stars finally relented<sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-6">&#91;6&#93;</a></sup> acknowledging the social media, email and letter campaign led by Baylay<sup id="cite_ref-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-7">&#91;7&#93;</a></sup> had been key in their decision to awarding an additional star in favour of Luise Rainer.<sup id="cite_ref-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-8">&#91;8&#93;</a></sup> In September 2011, Rainer then aged 101, flew to Berlin from her London home to formally receive her star on the Boulevard der Stars<sup id="cite_ref-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-9">&#91;9&#93;</a></sup> together with Paul Baylay and <a href="/wiki/Klaus_Wowereit" title="Klaus Wowereit">Klaus Wowerweit</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-10">&#91;10&#93;</a></sup> the mayor of Berlin. 
</p><p>Baylay has made several television appearances together with boyband Blue. In early 2013 he appeared on <a href="/wiki/ITV2" title="ITV2">ITV2</a>’s <a href="/wiki/The_Big_Reunion" title="The Big Reunion">The Big ReUnion</a> together with the band and later that year appeared on Season 8 of Pro7’s “<a href="/wiki/Germany%27s_Next_Topmodel" title="Germany&#39;s Next Topmodel">Germany's Next Top Model</a>”<sup id="cite_ref-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-11">&#91;11&#93;</a></sup> in <a href="/wiki/Malibu,_California" title="Malibu, California">Malibu</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-12">&#91;12&#93;</a></sup> California where he set the challenge for the Blue’s new music video "<a href="/wiki/Without_You_(Blue_song)" title="Without You (Blue song)">Without You</a>". In 2014, Baylay returned to ITV2’s <a href="/wiki/The_Big_Reunion_(series_2)" title="The Big Reunion (series 2)">The Big ReUnion in Season 2 (series_2)</a> as manager of newly formed “<a href="/wiki/5th_Story" title="5th Story">5th Story</a>” and in 2015 he made a cameo appearance as an actor appearing as himself in Episodes Three &amp; Four of ITV2’s "Blue Go Mad in Ibiza".<sup id="cite_ref-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-13">&#91;13&#93;</a></sup> 
</p><p>All four members of <a href="/wiki/Blue_(English_band)" class="mw-redirect" title="Blue (English band)">Blue</a> have been through personal bankruptcy<sup id="cite_ref-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-14">&#91;14&#93;</a></sup> guided by Baylay as detailed on ITV2's <a href="/wiki/The_Big_Reunion" title="The Big Reunion">The Big Reunion</a> in an effort to clean up a decade's worth of accumulative personal debts and bad investments. The group has sold in excess of 16 million albums worldwide over five studio albums and won two Brit Awards in <a href="/wiki/2002_Brit_Awards" title="2002 Brit Awards">2002</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/2003_Brit_Awards" title="2003 Brit Awards">2003</a>.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Paul_DH_Baylay&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<li id="cite_note-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.ok-magazin.de/people/gntm-2013/18060/-music-edition-bei-gntm-videodreh-mit-der-boyband-blue">"<span class="cs1-kern-left">'</span>Music Edition' bei 'GNTM' - Videodreh mit der Boyband Blue"</a> (in German).</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=%27Music+Edition%27+bei+%27GNTM%27+-+Videodreh+mit+der+Boyband+Blue&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ok-magazin.de%2Fpeople%2Fgntm-2013%2F18060%2F-music-edition-bei-gntm-videodreh-mit-der-boyband-blue&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APaul+DH+Baylay" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>

<li id="cite_note-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-13">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.digitalspy.com/tv/news/a608240/blue-go-mad-in-ibiza-boyband-will-run-a-bar-for-itv2/">"Blue to run Ibiza bar for ITV2 show"</a>. 2014-11-06.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Blue+to+run+Ibiza+bar+for+ITV2+show&amp;rft.date=2014-11-06&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalspy.com%2Ftv%2Fnews%2Fa608240%2Fblue-go-mad-in-ibiza-boyband-will-run-a-bar-for-itv2%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APaul+DH+Baylay" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>

<div class="shortdescription nomobile noexcerpt noprint searchaux" style="display:none">Charter school in the United States</div><table class="infobox vcard" style="width:22em"><tbody><tr><th colspan="2" class="fn org" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;background-color: lavender">Beehive Science and Technology Academy</th></tr><tr><th colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background:lavender">Location</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="mw-kartographer-map mw-kartographer-container center" style="width: 270px; -111.5206</span></span></span></a></span></span></span></td></tr><tr><th colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background:lavender">Information</th></tr><tr><th scope="row">Type</th><td><a href="/wiki/Charter_school" title="Charter school">Charter</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Established</th><td>2005</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">School district</th><td><a href="/w/index.php?title=Charter_School_District&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Charter School District (page does not exist)">Charter School District</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Principal</th><td>Hanifi Oguz</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Faculty</th><td>17</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Grades</th><td><a href="/wiki/Education_in_the_United_States#School_grades" title="Education in the United States">6 to 12</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Enrollment</th><td>280&#160;(Oct of 2018)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Student to teacher ratio</th><td>1:12</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Color(s)</th><td>Maroon, Pelham blue</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Slogan</th><td>"A small school with big ideas."</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Mascot</th><td>Bee circling around in a Rutherford atom model</td></tr><tr><th scope="row"><a href="/wiki/Athletic_nickname" title="Athletic nickname">Nickname</a></th><td>BSTA, Beehive, Beehive Academy</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Website</th><td><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.beehiveacademy.org">www.beehiveacademy.org</a></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p><b>Beehive Science and Technology Academy</b> (BSTA), is a college preparatory <a href="/wiki/Charter_school" title="Charter school">charter school</a> located in <a href="/wiki/Sandy,_Utah" title="Sandy, Utah">Sandy, Utah</a>.  Open to all students grades 6-12, Beehive’s focus is math, science and technology.  Beehive has small class sizes, rigorous curriculum, dedicated faculty, individualized instruction and comprehensive college and career counseling. Beehive supports creative development through their art programs.
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading"><input type="checkbox" role="button" id="toctogglecheckbox" class="toctogglecheckbox" style="display:none" /><div class="toctitle" lang="en" dir="ltr"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#History"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">History</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#Organization"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">Organization</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-3"><a href="#Learning_environment"><span class="tocnumber">3</span> <span class="toctext">Learning environment</span></a></li>

</div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="History">History</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Beehive_Science_and_Technology_Academy&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: History">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>BSTA opened August 29, 2005 in <a href="/wiki/Sugar_House,_Salt_Lake_City" title="Sugar House, Salt Lake City">Sugarhouse</a>. In 2008 the school moved to its <a href="/wiki/Murray,_Utah" title="Murray, Utah">Murray</a> campus, which was used until the beginning of the 2010-2011 school year. The stay in this facility was short because the building itself was inadequate and expensive. Beehive then moved to its current location in Sandy off of 9400 South and 700 E.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Organization">Organization</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Beehive_Science_and_Technology_Academy&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Organization">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>An eight-member <a href="/wiki/School_board" class="mw-redirect" title="School board">school board</a> governs BSTA. Board members are business leaders and active members of the community who bring experience in Law, Technology, Finance, Architecture and Real Estate. 
</p><p>The parents of BSTA students chaperone at dances, provide parties and fundraisers, communicating calendar items, volunteer, and other tasks that teachers and staff aren’t able to accomplish. Parents and community members are encouraged to attend the school community council meetings to support and contribute to the better functioning of the School Land Trust Program.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Learning_environment">Learning environment</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Beehive_Science_and_Technology_Academy&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Learning environment">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Because of Beehive’s low <a href="/wiki/Student%E2%80%93teacher_ratio" title="Student–teacher ratio">student–teacher ratio</a> (1:12), students can progress quickly . Students are placed in classes based on their math skills. Their skills in math and other core subjects are monitored throughout the year with research-based adaptive testing. Free tutoring is offered by every teacher every week after school. Field trips provide additional learning and socializing skills. Each year local, expedition, and out-of-state college trips are offered to students. Every spring, students have the opportunity to go to Europe with faculty and parents.
</p><p>Since its inception in 2005, Beehive teachers have been meeting with their students and parents at their homes. These visits benefit the parents since they gain a better idea about the school’s educational policy and have the opportunity to know and understand their student’s teacher(s) better. The goal is to visit all students in their homes once a year.
</p><p>Beehive Academy offers numerous after-school activities.  For example, clubs meet weekly in the following areas: AMSP (Advanced Math &amp; Science Program), FIRST Robotics club, FIRST LEGO club, chess, <a href="/wiki/National_Honor_Society" title="National Honor Society">National Honor</a>/<a href="/wiki/National_Junior_Honor_Society" title="National Junior Honor Society">Junior Honor Society</a>, Structural Engineering, anatomy and dissection club, MathCounts, world cultures, <a href="/wiki/Glee_club" title="Glee club">glee club</a>, jewelry club, yearbook, and more. These clubs have produced a number of successes in state and national competitions. A sampling of the winners are: 3rd place FTC Robotics team 2010-2011, 23rd place FIRST Lego League 2010-2011, 3rd place at the World Festival in FIRST Lego League, Utah FIRST Lego League State Champions (twice), 18 individual awards/scholarships 2009-2010 Regional Science Fair, 2008-2009 Salt Lake Valley Champion Spelling Bee, 3rd place in regional 2010-2011 Math Counts (top 10 in Utah).
</p>

<p><br />
</p>

<table class="box-Peacock plainlinks metadata ambox ambox-content ambox-peacock" role="presentation"><tbody><tr><td class="mbox-image"><div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" decoding="async" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div></td><td class="mbox-text"><div class="mbox-text-span">This article contains wording that <b><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Manual_of_Style/Words_to_watch#Puffery" title="Wikipedia:Manual of Style/Words to watch">promotes the subject in a subjective manner</a> without imparting real information</b>.<span class="hide-when-compact"> Please remove or replace such wording and instead of making proclamations about a subject's importance, use facts and attribution to demonstrate that importance.</span>  <small class="date-container"><i>(<span class="date">November 2011</span>)</i></small><small class="hide-when-compact"><i> (<a href="/wiki/Help:Maintenance_template_removal" title="Help:Maintenance template removal">Learn how and when to remove this template message</a>)</i></small></div></td></tr></tbody></table>

</div><small class="hide-when-compact"><i> (<a href="/wiki/Help:Maintenance_template_removal" title="Help:Maintenance template removal">Learn how and when to remove this template message</a>)</i></small></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p><b>Béla Bartók Music High School of Miskolc</b> (Miskolci Bartók Béla Zeneművészeti Szakközépiskola) is situated in the Palace of Music (Zenepalota) in Bartók square <a href="/wiki/Miskolc" title="Miskolc">Miskolc</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hungary" title="Hungary">Hungary</a>. It is a famous <a href="/wiki/Music_school" title="Music school">music school</a> named after the famous Hungarian composer <a href="/wiki/B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k" title="Béla Bartók">Béla Bartók</a>. It was founded in 1966.
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading"><input type="checkbox" role="button" id="toctogglecheckbox" class="toctogglecheckbox" style="display:none" /><div class="toctitle" lang="en" dir="ltr"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#History_of_secondary_music_teaching_in_Miskolc"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">History of secondary music teaching in Miskolc</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#The_building_’Music_Palace’"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">The building ’Music Palace’</span></a></li>

<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-6"><a href="#Sources"><span class="tocnumber">6</span> <span class="toctext">Sources</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="History_of_secondary_music_teaching_in_Miskolc">History of secondary music teaching in Miskolc</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: History of secondary music teaching in Miskolc">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><a href="/wiki/Music_education" title="Music education">Music teaching</a> in Miskolc has more than 100-year-old tradition. First, secondary vocational training became independent of music schools, then as a result of this a <a href="/wiki/Teacher_training_college" class="mw-redirect" title="Teacher training college">teacher training college</a> was founded in addition to the secondary training. All the primary, secondary and tertiary but cooperating and relying on each other. The growing expectations of the public concerning our school as well, made it possible to incorporate general subjects into the curriculum. Nowadays secondary music education has to provide students with proper knowledge for further musical learning.
</p>
<h2><span id="The_building_.E2.80.99Music_Palace.E2.80.99"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="The_building_’Music_Palace’">The building ’Music Palace’</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: The building ’Music Palace’">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>The building in which the school is located is called the ’Palace of Music’, which was built in <a href="/wiki/Neo-Rococo" class="mw-redirect" title="Neo-Rococo">neo-rococo</a> style in 1927. It has a beautiful <a href="/wiki/Concert_hall" class="mw-redirect" title="Concert hall">concert hall</a> with excellent acoustics and is an ideal home for concerts and music teaching.
</p><p>Béla Bartók Music High School in Miskolc started its first school year in 1966, based on the work of former musical institutions in the town. It is a music <a href="/wiki/High_school" class="mw-redirect" title="High school">high school</a> offering education and professional music training at the same time. This way complementarity plays here a significant role when it comes to teaching academic and music subjects.
</p><p>Music is a profile building part of <a href="/wiki/Curriculum" title="Curriculum">curriculum</a> with an advanced level of requirements and a large number of lessons devoted to it. The core therefore that sets music high schools apart from a regular high school is the duality of high school education and professional music teaching. The institution plays an important role in the region because it is the only music high school in three neighbouring counties – <a href="/wiki/Borsod-Aba%C3%BAj-Zempl%C3%A9n_County" title="Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County">Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplém</a>, <a href="/wiki/Heves_County" title="Heves County">Heves</a> and <a href="/wiki/N%C3%B3gr%C3%A1d_County" title="Nógrád County">Nógrád</a>.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Faculties_of_the_school">Faculties of the school</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Faculties of the school">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Piano, organ, violin, viola, cello, contrabass, guitar, flute, oboe, clarinet, bassoon, trumpet, French horn, trombone, tuba, percussion instruments, solo-singing, solmization, theory of music, folk music, church music and jazz (singing, percussion, saxophon, trumpet), harpsichord.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Music_education">Music education</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: Music education">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Children come to study in the school after basic <a href="/wiki/Vocational_training" class="mw-redirect" title="Vocational training">vocational training</a>, but all of them have to take an <a href="/wiki/Entrance_examination" class="mw-redirect" title="Entrance examination">entrance examination</a> in front of a professional board and can choose among 24 faculties. The music subjects are taught by both professional instrument specialists and music teachers.
The compulsory music subjects which are included in the curriculum are the following: the main subject, solmization, theory of music, literature of music and piano, which is compulsory to all students.
The school attributes great importance to individual instrumental and theoretical training and emphasizes the importance of working in music orchestras, for example, playing in chamber-music groups, string-, wind-, or symphonic orchestras and singing in choirs. These subjects can be chosen as electives.
According to the statistics 97% of the school-leavers go on to music colleges or the Academy of Music and just a few choose other professions.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="General_education">General education</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5" title="Edit section: General education">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Besides musical education the school pays special attention to general subjects, they are part of the curriculum. One of the special subjects of the school within the <a href="/wiki/Physics" title="Physics">physics</a> is <a href="/wiki/Acoustics" title="Acoustics">acoustics</a>. A lot of students choose it as an elective subject for their school leaving exams. In addition, students have the opportunity to learn English or German languages and the school offers them the opportunity to learn Italian as well.
</p><p>There are no more than 25 students in each class, which is ideal for both the sophisticated artistic work and for the effective teaching and studying processes. The education lasts for 5 years. At the end of the 4th year students can take the school leaving exam in the general subjects. After completing the 5th year they take a professional exam in music and get their qualifications as musicians. They can go on with their studies in any institution of <a href="/wiki/Higher_education" title="Higher education">higher education</a>. For obvious reasons, most of the students choose music colleges or the Academy of Music.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Sources">Sources</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=B%C3%A9la_Bart%C3%B3k_Music_High_School&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6" title="Edit section: Sources">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><a href="/wiki/Palace_of_Music_(Miskolc)" class="mw-redirect" title="Palace of Music (Miskolc)">Palace of Music (Miskolc)</a>
</p><p><a rel="nofollow" class="external free" href="https://www.facebook.com/bartokmiskolc">http://www.facebook.com/bartokmiskolc</a>
</p><p><span id="coordinates" class="metadata coord-missing"></span>
</p></div>
~~~~
<table class="box-Peacock plainlinks metadata ambox ambox-content ambox-peacock" role="presentation"><tbody><tr><td class="mbox-image"><div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" decoding="async" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div></td><td class="mbox-text"><div class="mbox-text-span">This article contains wording that <b><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Manual_of_Style/Words_to_watch#Puffery" title="Wikipedia:Manual of Style/Words to watch">promotes the subject in a subjective manner</a> without imparting real information</b>.<span class="hide-when-compact"> Please remove or replace such wording and instead of making proclamations about a subject's importance, use facts and attribution to demonstrate that importance.</span>  <small class="date-container"><i>(<span class="date">July 2019</span>)</i></small><small class="hide-when-compact"><i> (<a href="/wiki/Help:Maintenance_template_removal" title="Help:Maintenance template removal">Learn how and when to remove this template message</a>)</i></small></div></td></tr></tbody></table>

<table class="infobox biota" style="width:22em"><caption class="breed">Belgian Warmblood</caption><tbody><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a href="/wiki/File:CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg" class="image"><img alt="CHI Genève 2013 - 20131213 - Janika Sprunger et Electra Van&#39;t Roosaker.jpg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg/220px-CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="220" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg/330px-CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg/440px-CHI_Gen%C3%A8ve_2013_-_20131213_-_Janika_Sprunger_et_Electra_Van%27t_Roosaker.jpg 2x" data-file-width="3184" data-file-height="3185" /></a><div>Electra Van't Roosakker ridden by <a href="/wiki/Janika_Sprunger" title="Janika Sprunger">Janika Sprunger</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=Concours_hippique_international_de_Gen%C3%A8ve&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Concours hippique international de Genève (page does not exist)">Concours hippique international de Genève</a><span class="noprint" style="font-size:85%; font-style: normal;">&#160;&#91;<a href="https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concours_hippique_international_de_Gen%C3%A8ve" class="extiw" title="fr:Concours hippique international de Genève">fr</a>&#93;</span>, 13 December 2013</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Other names</th><td><div class="plainlist"><ul><li>BWP</li><li><a href="/wiki/Dutch_language" title="Dutch language">Dutch</a>: <span lang="nl" style="font-style: normal;">Belgisch Warmbloedpaard</span></li></ul></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Country of origin</th><td>Belgium</td></tr><tr><th scope="row">Use</th><td><div class="plainlist"><ul><li><a href="/wiki/Dressage" title="Dressage">dressage</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Show-jumping" class="mw-redirect" title="Show-jumping">show-jumping</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Three-day_eventing" class="mw-redirect" title="Three-day eventing">three-day eventing</a></li></ul></div></td></tr><tr><th colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#DDD;">Traits</th></tr><tr><th scope="row">Distinguishing features</th><td><a href="/wiki/Warmblood" title="Warmblood">warmblood</a> <a href="/wiki/Sport_horse" title="Sport horse">sport horse</a></td></tr><tr><th colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#DDD;">Breed standards</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><div class="plainlist"><ul><li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.belgianwarmblood.com/about">BWP-North American District</a></li></ul></div></td></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#DDD;"><div class="plainlist"><ul><li><i><span class="trinominal"><a href="/wiki/Horse" title="Horse">Equus ferus caballus</a></span></i></li></ul></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>The <b>Belgian Warmblood</b>, <a href="/wiki/Dutch_language" title="Dutch language">Dutch</a>: <span lang="nl" style="font-style: normal;"><b>Belgisch Warmbloedpaard</b></span>, is a Belgian <a href="/wiki/List_of_horse_breeds" title="List of horse breeds">breed</a> of <a href="/wiki/Warmblood" title="Warmblood">warmblood</a> <a href="/wiki/Sport_horse" title="Sport horse">sport horse</a>. It is bred for <a href="/wiki/Dressage" title="Dressage">dressage</a>, for <a href="/wiki/Show-jumping" class="mw-redirect" title="Show-jumping">show-jumping</a> and for <a href="/wiki/Three-day_event" class="mw-redirect" title="Three-day event">three-day eventing</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-elise_1-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-elise-1">&#91;1&#93;</a></sup><sup class="reference nowrap">:<span>164</span></sup> It is one of three Belgian warmblood breeds or <a href="/wiki/Stud-book" class="mw-redirect" title="Stud-book">stud-books</a>, the others being the <a href="/wiki/Zangersheide" title="Zangersheide">Zangersheide</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Belgian_Sport_Horse" title="Belgian Sport Horse">Belgian Sport Horse</a> – to which it is closely similar.<sup id="cite_ref-equinejournal_2-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-equinejournal-2">&#91;2&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading"><input type="checkbox" role="button" id="toctogglecheckbox" class="toctogglecheckbox" style="display:none" /><div class="toctitle" lang="en" dir="ltr"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#History"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">History</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#Breed_characteristics"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">Breed characteristics</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-3"><a href="#Use"><span class="tocnumber">3</span> <span class="toctext">Use</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-4"><a href="#References"><span class="tocnumber">4</span> <span class="toctext">References</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="History">History</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Belgian_Warmblood&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: History">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p><a href="/wiki/Horse_breeding" title="Horse breeding">Horse breeders</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands">Netherlands</a>, <a href="/wiki/Germany" title="Germany">Germany</a>, and <a href="/wiki/France" title="France">France</a> had been producing elegant <a href="/wiki/Equestrianism" title="Equestrianism">saddle horses</a> for hundreds of years.  However, because the Belgian government was concerned about protecting the bloodlines of the <a href="/wiki/Belgian_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Belgian (horse)">Brabant</a> (Belgian draft horse), it was not until the 1950s that breeders in Belgium were allowed to breed lighter saddle horses.<sup id="cite_ref-hector_3-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-hector-3">&#91;3&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>The <a href="/wiki/Foundation_bloodstock" class="mw-redirect" title="Foundation bloodstock">foundation stock</a> of the Belgian Warmblood included jumping horses from France and the Netherlands, as well as <a href="/wiki/Hanoverian_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hanoverian (horse)">Hanoverians</a> and <a href="/wiki/Holstein_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Holstein (horse)">Holsteiners</a> from Germany.
</p><p>The first stallion show for riding horses in Belgium took place, illegally, in 1953; the BWP was founded in 1955. Without native riding horses or all-purpose <a href="/wiki/Heavy_warmblood" title="Heavy warmblood">heavy warmbloods</a>, Belgian breeders had to import stallions and mares.  Over the course of 50 years, the BWP accrued a mare base of over 3,500 broodmares and produced a significant number of international-quality show jumpers. In 2010, the BWP was ranked 4th in the FEI/WBFSH International Show Jumping standings, below only the KWPN-Dutch Warmblood, Selle Français and Holsteiner studbooks.<sup id="cite_ref-WBFSHJumping2006_4-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WBFSHJumping2006-4">&#91;4&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Breed_characteristics">Breed characteristics</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Belgian_Warmblood&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2" title="Edit section: Breed characteristics">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>As a <a href="/wiki/Warmblood" title="Warmblood">warmblood</a> horse, the Belgian Warmblood is characterized not by uniformity of <a href="/wiki/Equine_coat_color" title="Equine coat color">coat color</a>, appearance or <a href="/wiki/Pedigree_chart" title="Pedigree chart">pedigree chart</a>, but by uniformity of purpose. Like other warmbloods, Belgian Warmblood breeding horses are subjected to rigorous <a href="/wiki/Studbook_selection" title="Studbook selection">studbook selection</a>.
</p>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Hip_brand_bay.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/db/Hip_brand_bay.jpg/220px-Hip_brand_bay.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="165" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/db/Hip_brand_bay.jpg/330px-Hip_brand_bay.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/db/Hip_brand_bay.jpg/440px-Hip_brand_bay.jpg 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="960" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Hip_brand_bay.jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>The studbook brand, which features a "pinwheel" of horse heads, is given to all Belgian Warmbloods</div></div></div>
<p>The most reliable way to positively identify a Belgian Warmblood is by the brand on the left thigh. Belgian Warmblood foals receive this brand during their foal inspection, when they are given a passport and deemed free of obvious defects.
</p><p>Between the ages of three and four years old, Belgian Warmblood <a href="/wiki/Stallion_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Stallion (horse)">stallions</a> are presented to a jury in a "Hengstenkeuring" or stallion licensing test. The licensing test consists of a veterinary inspection, subjective evaluation of the stallion's <a href="/wiki/Horse_conformation" class="mw-redirect" title="Horse conformation">conformation</a> and jumping ability without a rider, and evaluation of the stallion's qualities <a href="/wiki/Equestrianism" title="Equestrianism">under saddle</a>. Stallions that do not achieve the desired marks in the licensing test are not eligible for the studbook.  To retain  status in the studbook, stallions must participate in competitions for young show jumping horses called the "Classic Cycle".<sup id="cite_ref-Interstallion_5-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Interstallion-5">&#91;5&#93;</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Mare_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Mare (horse)">Mares</a> take part in similar conformational evaluations, however judgement of a mare's qualities as a riding horse are elective.
</p><p>Belgian Warmbloods range in size and substance, but the ideal size for a stallion is between 16 and 17 <a href="/wiki/Hand_(unit)" title="Hand (unit)">hands</a> high at the <a href="/wiki/Withers" title="Withers">withers</a>. <a href="/wiki/Mare_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Mare (horse)">Mares</a> are not eligible for breeding rights unless they exceed 15.1 hands high.<sup id="cite_ref-bwprules_6-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-bwprules-6">&#91;6&#93;</a></sup>  In type, the Belgian Warmblood is similar to the <a href="/wiki/Holstein_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Holstein (horse)">Holsteiner</a>, <a href="/wiki/Selle_Fran%C3%A7ais" title="Selle Français">Selle Français</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dutch_Warmblood" title="Dutch Warmblood">Dutch Warmblood</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Hanoverian_(horse)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hanoverian (horse)">Hanoverian</a>, and less like the <a href="/wiki/Trakehner" title="Trakehner">Trakehner</a>.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Use">Use</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Belgian_Warmblood&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3" title="Edit section: Use">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son,_Dublin_(Irl)_CSIO5*_2008.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6b/Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg/220px-Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="192" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6b/Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg/330px-Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6b/Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg/440px-Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son%2C_Dublin_%28Irl%29_CSIO5%2A_2008.jpg 2x" data-file-width="1847" data-file-height="1613" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Denis_Lynch_and_Nabab%E2%80%99s_Son,_Dublin_(Irl)_CSIO5*_2008.jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Denis Lynch and Nabab's Son, Dublin Horse Show 2008</div></div></div>
<p>Over the past 20 years, research has supported observations regarding the high <a href="/wiki/Heritability" title="Heritability">heritability</a> of jumping ability compared with that of dressage-quality gaits.<sup id="cite_ref-christmann_7-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-christmann-7">&#91;7&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Belgian_Warmblood&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4" title="Edit section: References">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<table role="presentation" class="mbox-small plainlinks sistersitebox" style="background-color:#f9f9f9;border:1px solid #aaa;color:#000">

The Horse Magazine. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.thehorsemagazine.com/BREEDINGBARN/BREEDING%20ARTICLES/BelgianBreeding%20folder/belgianwarmbloods.html">the original</a> on 2003-12-08<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2007-11-01</span></span>. <q>'As late as the 50s in Belgium we had the heavy horses – the Brabants – and to protect the breeding of the heavy horses, it was not allowed to breed anything else.'</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Belgian+Warmbloods&amp;rft.pub=The+Horse+Magazine&amp;rft.au=Chris+Hector&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thehorsemagazine.com%2FBREEDINGBARN%2FBREEDING%2520ARTICLES%2FBelgianBreeding%2520folder%2Fbelgianwarmbloods.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABelgian+Warmblood" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-WBFSHJumping2006-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-WBFSHJumping2006_4-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.wbfsh.org/files/Jumping_studbook_final.pdf">"FEI/WBFSH World Ranking List – Jumping Horses by Studbook 2010"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. WBFSH<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2011-02-13</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=FEI%2FWBFSH+World+Ranking+List+%E2%80%93+Jumping+Horses+by+Studbook+2010&amp;rft.pub=WBFSH&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wbfsh.org%2Ffiles%2FJumping_studbook_final.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABelgian+Warmblood" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Interstallion-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Interstallion_5-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.biw.kuleuven.be/genlog/livgen/docs/BWP.pdf">"Belgisch Warmbloedpaard (BWP)"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. Katholieke Universiteit Leuven<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2011-02-13</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Belgisch+Warmbloedpaard+%28BWP%29&amp;rft.pub=Katholieke+Universiteit+Leuven&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.biw.kuleuven.be%2Fgenlog%2Flivgen%2Fdocs%2FBWP.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABelgian+Warmblood" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-bwprules-6"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-bwprules_6-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFBWP-NAD" class="citation web cs1">BWP-NAD. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110707222531/http://www.belgianwarmblood.com/assets/docs_news/BelgianWarmblood%20Book%202007%20final.pdf">"Belgian Warmblood Book 2007"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2007-11-01</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Belgian+Warmblood+Book+2007&amp;rft.au=BWP-NAD&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.belgianwarmblood.com%2Fassets%2Fdocs_news%2FBelgianWarmblood%2520Book%25202007%2520final.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABelgian+Warmblood" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-christmann-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-christmann_7-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFChristmann2003" class="citation web cs1">Christmann, Dr. Ludwig (2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hanoverian.com/ludwigherit.html">"Specialists or All-rounders? Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2007-11-01</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Specialists+or+All-rounders%3F+Degrees+of+heritability+and+genetic+correlations+in+the+Hanoverian+breed.&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft.aulast=Christmann&amp;rft.aufirst=Dr.+Ludwig&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hanoverian.com%2Fludwigherit.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABelgian+Warmblood" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r982806391"/></span>
</li>
</ol></div>

Many have complex or obscure histories, so inclusion here does not necessarily imply that a breed is predominantly or exclusively from those countries.</div></td></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
